title: Ryze broken.
body: Just curious to know when riot will gut the shit out of this champion, he's just so broken..

replies.body: he got nerfed a patch or two ago, if he's still broken then you either let the game stall until lategame or you were stupid enough to trade with him while he had stacks of his passive, think of him as a top lane tanky Annie, if he has 4 stacks of his passive and youre standing near him, then apply a generous amount of lubricant to your anus and brace yourself.
He was already gutted pretty deep but I think hes in a good spot atm.
your joking right? its pretty much headbutt your keyboard and then win..
No he isn't OP he is completely balanced. :)
